setStrict(boolean) - Method in class com.github.methylene.sym.PermutationFactory.Builder
When strict is set, the resulting Factory does not allow duplicate elements in input arrays, in the PermutationFactory.from(int[], int[]) or PermutationFactory.sort(char[]) methods and their various overloads, and will throw an IllegalArgumentException instead.
setValidate(boolean) - Method in class com.github.methylene.sym.PermutationFactory.Builder
When validate is set, run an extra assertion on each Permitation returned by the from PermutationFactory.from(int[], int[]) and PermutationFactory.sort(char[]) methods and their various overloads.
